translation.en: -  - Sorry, guys! I'm still getting used to driving inside a mansion.
translation.ja: ごめんね 家での運転は慣れてなくて

translation.en: And driving.
translation.ja: 運転自体も

translation.en: Are you guys okay?
translation.ja: ケガはない？

translation.en: I'm good. The airbag broke my fall.
translation.ja: エアバッグのおかげでね

translation.en: Darcy, the wagon doesn't have an airbag.
translation.ja: ダーシー そんなのないだろ

translation.en: I meant Murray.
translation.ja: マレーのこと

translation.en: After that collision, I need to make an appointment with my chiropractor...
translation.ja: カイロプラクティックの 予約を入れなくちゃ

translation.en: and my attorney.
translation.ja: 弁護士も必要だな

translation.en: Could have sworn my bedroom was around here somewhere.
translation.ja: ベッドルームはどこだ

translation.en: Let's ask her for directions.
translation.ja: 彼女に聞いてみようよ

translation.en: That's Irona, my maid.
translation.ja: メイドのアイロナだ

translation.en: Wow. You are really hot.
translation.ja: 君ってホットだね

translation.en: My electrostatic super capacitor tends to overheat.
translation.ja: コンデンサーが オーバーヒートで

translation.en: Guess I should have mentioned she's also a robot.
translation.ja: 彼女はロボットだよ

translation.en: I splurged on the supermodel model.
translation.ja: スーパーモデル･モデルだ

translation.en: I've never uttered these words in my life,
translation.ja: こんなこと言うのは 初めてだけど

translation.en: but money well spent.
translation.ja: いい買い物したね

translation.en: This is Murray, my best friend and money manager.
translation.ja: マレーは親友で財務担当だ

translation.en: And this is Darcy, my other best friend. Don't let her see my bank password.
translation.ja: ダーシーも親友だけど 口座の暗証番号は教えるな

translation.en: We'll talk later.
translation.ja: あとで話が

translation.en: Welcome to Richie's bedroom.
translation.ja: ここがベッドルーム

translation.en: Wow! This place is awesome!
translation.ja: すごいわ 最高のベッドルームね

translation.en: I can't believe you live here now.
translation.ja: 信じられない

translation.en: I can't believe you paid for all of this!
translation.ja: 同感だ　ここまで金持ちとは

translation.en: Check it out.
translation.ja: これも見て

translation.en: It's got a dollar comforter.
translation.ja: ドル札ベッドだ

translation.en: You mean down?
translation.ja: 有料ってこと？

translation.en: No, I mean it's filled with dollars.
translation.ja: いや 札束が詰まってる

translation.en: Master Richie's entire room is automated
translation.ja: リッチー様のお部屋は

translation.en: and can be controlled by a push of a button on his room remote.
translation.ja: すべてリモコンで 操作できます

translation.en: Or roomote.
translation.ja: “ルームコン”でね クスクス　エヘヘ

translation.en: Chuckle. Chuckle.
translation.ja: クスクス　エヘヘ

translation.en: Is that an aquarium?
translation.ja: 巨大水槽まで？

translation.en: Yep! Meet my new pet whales:
translation.ja: ペットのクジラたちだ

translation.en: Dollar, Dollar, and Bill, y'all!
translation.ja: 名前は“ドル”と“ドル” それに“100ドル”

translation.en: All you need is a bubbling treasure chest.
translation.ja: 海底に宝箱が必要ね

translation.en: Over there.
translation.ja: あるよ

translation.en: Is that real gold?
translation.ja: 純金製？ 話は変わるけど シュノーケルはある？

translation.en: And on a completely unrelated note, do you have a snorkel?
translation.ja: 話は変わるけど シュノーケルはある？

translation.en: My name is Richie Rich,
translation.ja: 僕はリッチー･リッチ 普通の子供だ リッチー･リッチ

translation.en: and I'm just a normal kid...
translation.ja: 僕はリッチー･リッチ 普通の子供だ リッチー･リッチ 僕はリッチー･リッチ 普通の子供だ 僕はリッチー･リッチ 普通の子供だ ジェイク･ブレナン

translation.en: except that I have
translation.ja: ジェイク･ブレナン ジェイク･ブレナン 超大金持ちなだけ

translation.en: a trillion dollars.
translation.ja: 超大金持ちなだけ

translation.en: You see, I used all the vegetables I never ate to create a new energy source
translation.ja: 嫌いな野菜で 新しい燃料を発明したら

translation.en: - and sold it for a lot of money. -
translation.ja: これが大当たり

translation.en: Now I live in a huge mansion
translation.ja: 遊園地つきの豪邸に レーシングカー

translation.en: with my own amusement park, race car,
translation.ja: 遊園地つきの豪邸に レーシングカー ロボットのメイド

translation.en: and personal robot maid.
translation.ja: ロボットのメイド ロボットメイド ロボットのメイド ロボットのメイド ブルック･ウェクスラー ブルック･ウェクスラー ブルック･ウェクスラー 家族や親友との 新生活がスタートした

translation.en: And I have my family and the best friends in the world to share my fortune with.
translation.ja: 家族や親友との 新生活がスタートした

translation.en: My dad, my jealous sister Harper,
translation.ja: パパと姉のハーパー キフ･ ヴァンデンウーベル パパと姉のハーパー パパと姉のハーパー ローレン･テイラー ローレン･テイラー ローレン･テイラー 財務担当のマレー 浪費家のダーシー

translation.en: my money manager Murray,
translation.ja: 財務担当のマレー 浪費家のダーシー 財務担当のマレー 浪費家のダーシー ジョシュア･カーロン

translation.en: and my money spender Darcy.
translation.ja: 財務担当のマレー 浪費家のダーシー 財務担当のマレー 浪費家のダーシー ジェンナ･オルテガ

translation.en: I guess you could say by not eating my vegetables,
translation.ja: 僕は野菜嫌いなおかげで 「リッチー・リッチ」 「リッチー・リッチ」

translation.en: I became the richest
translation.ja: 「リッチー・リッチ」 世界一 リッチな 子供になったんだ

translation.en: and luckiest kid in the world!
translation.ja: 「リッチー・リッチ」 世界一 リッチな 子供になったんだ 世界一 リッチな 子供になったんだ 脚本：ジェフ･ホズデン 　　　ティム･ポロック

translation.en: Gold bar?
translation.ja: 金の延べ棒？

translation.en: I wanted a candy bar! Stupid machine...
translation.ja: チョコバーが欲しいのに 使えないマシンだ

translation.en: Richie, I feel like you're throwing money away.
translation.ja: まさに〝猫に小判〞だな

translation.en: Did get this basketball for free.
translation.ja: タダでもらった

translation.en: That's great!
translation.ja: さすが チームごと買ったんだ

translation.en: When I bought a professional basketball team.
translation.ja: チームごと買ったんだ

translation.en: I'm glad we still hang out, even though you're rich now.
translation.ja: リッチになっても 友達よね？

translation.en: Of course! We're best friends.
translation.ja: 当然だ　親友だよ

translation.en: Now, check this out!
translation.ja: これを見て

translation.en: Air ball!
translation.ja: 大ハズレ！ 残念でした

translation.en: No more air balls for me!
translation.ja: 残念でした

translation.en: My engineers invented this never- miss basketball hoop...
translation.ja: 〝百発百中ゴール〞を 作らせたんだ

translation.en: after seeing my jump shot...
translation.ja: じゃないと入らない

translation.en: Sick!
translation.ja: 最高！

translation.en: If you think that's cool, you should see the bathrooms.
translation.ja: それなら バスルームも見てよ

translation.en: They were able to use the same technology on the toilets!
translation.ja: “百発百中トイレ”を 設置させた

translation.en: Master Richie, I just received a message from your father.
translation.ja: リッチー様 お父様から伝言です

translation.en: Richie, please come into the living room.
translation.ja: “リビングに来なさい”

translation.en: Irona, I know you have the voice modulation software,
translation.ja: 変声ソフトを 使うのはいいけど

translation.en: but please don't speak in my dad's voice.
translation.ja: パパの声はやめて

translation.en: Totally ruins the magic.
translation.ja: テンションが下がるよ

translation.en: Uh, ha- ha... Dad? This isn't our old house. You don't have to sleep in the living room or shower in the neighbor's sprinklers.
translation.ja: パパ 昔の家とは違うんだ 貧乏くさいマネはやめて

translation.en: Richie, I'm a man who doesn't require luxuries like beds or indoor plumbing.
translation.ja: ベッドや屋内トイレといった ぜいたく品は必要ない

translation.en: I can be happy on a couch.
translation.ja: ソファで寝るよ

translation.en: I have to be, since I can't figure out how to get in my bedroom with that high- tech entry system.
translation.ja: ベッドルームはハイテクで 入り方が分からない

translation.en: It's just a doorknob.
translation.ja: 普通のドアノブだ

translation.en: And what's that crazy- looking eye scanner device?
translation.ja: 目のスキャナーがついてる

translation.en: A peephole?
translation.ja: のぞき穴のこと？

translation.en: - Oh! -
translation.ja: そうだったか リッチー

translation.en: Richie.
translation.ja: リッチー

translation.en: My room looks exactly like the Harvard library.
translation.ja: 図書館みたいな部屋を ありがとう

translation.en: And while I might appreciate having a full- time librarian,
translation.ja: でも24時間 司書がいて

translation.en: I wish she wouldn't shush me every time I speak.
translation.ja: 私が話すたびに “シー”って

translation.en: I am not even in my room!
translation.ja: 私の部屋じゃない

translation.en: Harper, I knew how hard you've been working to get in Harvard
translation.ja: お姉ちゃんの 受験の手助けにと思って

translation.en: so I thought if I made your dream come true, it'd make you happy!
translation.ja: ハーバード大の図書館を 参考に作ったのさ

translation.en: You don't seem happy.
translation.ja: 気に入らないようだ

translation.en: I want to get into the actual Harvard,
translation.ja: ハーバードには 入りたいけど

translation.en: not a replica my slacker brother built.
translation.ja: 弟が作った ニセモノなんて

translation.en: It's not a replica! I bought the actual library building and had it moved here.
translation.ja: 本物の大学の図書館を 移築させた

translation.en: Well, most of it... the crane dropped one of the walls, so we had to replace it with plywood and spackle.
translation.ja: 壁が１枚 壊れたから ベニヤ板をのりで貼ったけど

translation.en: Spackle.
translation.ja: “のり”か

translation.en: That's a funny word.
translation.ja: 面白いこと言うな

translation.en: Dad, I can't handle living in this monument
translation.ja: こんな博物館みたいな 家はイヤ

translation.en: to Richie's pathetically lucky success.
translation.ja: バカみたいな発明して

translation.en: You should be happy for your brother.
translation.ja: 弟を褒めてやれよ

translation.en: Not only did he make a gajillion dollars,
translation.ja: 大金持ちになれた上に

translation.en: but that doodad he invented did something... good for the planet.
translation.ja: あの発明は 地球にもすごく優しい

translation.en: Eliminated the need for carbon- based fuel.
translation.ja: 炭素系燃料を減らせる

translation.en: Yeah, that.
translation.ja: それだよ

translation.en: All Richie did was catch lightning in a bottle!
translation.ja: 発明といっても 偶然の産物だわ

translation.en: Literally! He just crammed a bunch of uneaten vegetables into a bottle that happened to get struck by lightning.
translation.ja: 嫌いな野菜を瓶に詰めただけ 何が“奇跡の発明”よ

translation.en: Are you accusing me of not knowing what I was doing when I invented my trap- electricity- in- vegetables thingamajig?
translation.ja: 例の新しい燃料が できると知ってて詰めたんだ

translation.en: Dad. Why did you want to see us?
translation.ja: パパ 何の用で呼んだの？

translation.en: See you? I don't know.
translation.ja: 理由なんてない

translation.en: Oh, wait, yeah, uh...
translation.ja: いや　あった

translation.en: so I wanted to spend some quality time together. I feel really disconnected here.
translation.ja: 同じ家にいても 会えないと寂しい

translation.en: What if we had a family dinner?
translation.ja: 家族で夕食でも

translation.en: A family dinner?
translation.ja: 家族で？

translation.en: Why am I being punished?
translation.ja: 何のお仕置きよ

translation.en: Guess what?
translation.ja: 聞いて

translation.en: I hacked into your bank account and had you buy you a vertical wind tunnel.
translation.ja: あなたの預金を下ろして 浮遊装置を買ったの

translation.en: BTW, your password was really weak, so I went ahead and changed it for you.
translation.ja: あの暗証番号は バレやすいから変えたわ

translation.en: Okay, what's the new one?
translation.ja: 新しいのを教えて

translation.en: For security reasons, I can't tell you.
translation.ja: 防犯管理上 言えない

translation.en: Richie, we have a problem. It's your new jet.
translation.ja: 問題が起きた 君のジェット機が…

translation.en: Don't tell me there are more engine issues.
translation.ja: またエンジントラブルか

translation.en: Apparently, a solid gold jet has trouble staying in the air.
translation.ja: 純金の機体は 浮かせるのも一苦労だ

translation.en: #trillionaireproblems.
translation.ja: 金持ちの悩みは尽きない

translation.en: Jet or no jet, we can still skydive with this.
translation.ja: エンジンなんかなくても 飛べるわ

translation.en: Oh, no! Darcy crashed through the ceiling!
translation.ja: 天井を突き破っていったぞ

translation.en: It's worse than you think. Right above my room is a gorilla habitat.
translation.ja: 上の階では ゴリラを飼ってるんだ

translation.en: Of all the days to wear banana lip gloss.
translation.ja: バナナ味の リップを塗ってたの

translation.en: You're in good hands, Darcy.
translation.ja: 心配ないよ

translation.en: I downloaded an entire medical library on Irona's hard drive.
translation.ja: アイロナに医療ソフトを ダウンロードしたから

translation.en: Now, she's practically a doctor.
translation.ja: 医師も同然だ

translation.en: Before I do any more, I will need proof of insurance.
translation.ja: まず保険の加入状況を

translation.en: Darcy, I feel bad that you blasted through the ceiling
translation.ja: ダーシー ゴリラなんか飼ってた 僕のせいだ

translation.en: into my gorilla habitat...
translation.ja: ゴリラなんか飼ってた 僕のせいだ

translation.en: and that my ceiling fan was on high.
translation.ja: 天井の扇風機も

translation.en: I want to do something to make this up to you.
translation.ja: おわびをさせてよ

translation.en: I have just the thing! A coupon for a free lemonade at Corndog Larry's.
translation.ja: 屋台のレモネードの クーポン券をあげる

translation.en: How about I score us three passes
translation.ja: 史上最高のライブの チケットを―

translation.en: to a concert of a lifetime?
translation.ja: ３枚でどうかな

translation.en: Like the one and only U.S. show of Swedish house sensation
translation.ja: アメリカで １度きりのライブだ スウェディッシュ･ハウス･ センセーションの！

translation.en: Swedish House Sensation!
translation.ja: スウェディッシュ･ハウス･ センセーションの！

translation.en: That's awesome! He's the best deejay in the world!
translation.ja: やったわ 世界一 好きなＤＪよ

translation.en: Ow...
translation.ja: 痛いわ

translation.en: It hurts to get excited.
translation.ja: 興奮したせいね

translation.en: Maybe you didn't hear me. Coupon. Free lemonade.
translation.ja: 聞こえなかったかな レモネードのクーポン券だ

translation.en: Free.
translation.ja: タダで飲める

translation.en: Murray told me you bought the concert tickets
translation.ja: チケットを買ったそうね

translation.en: and exactly how much they cost.
translation.ja: ３枚でいくらしたの？

translation.en: I can't wait for tomorrow night!
translation.ja: 明日が楽しみだ

translation.en: Me neither!
translation.ja: 私もよ

translation.en: Now I just have to find something to wear...
translation.ja: 何を着て行こうかしら

translation.en: Irona, to the mall.
translation.ja: アイロナ 買いに行くわよ

translation.en: Richie.
translation.ja: リッチー

translation.en: I feel like you, Harp, and I are drifting apart,
translation.ja: 家族の絆はどこに行った

translation.en: so I'm reinstituting an old family tradition.
translation.ja: 恒例のあれを復活しよう

translation.en: Dad, Harp and I are too old to take baths together.
translation.ja: この年齢で お姉ちゃんとお風呂に？

translation.en: Starting tomorrow, I'm bringing back family game night.
translation.ja: 明日から ゲーム･ナイトを再開するぞ

translation.en: Tomorrow? I can't! I have plans!
translation.ja: 明日の夜は予定があるんだ

translation.en: Richie, when we moved here, we agreed.
translation.ja: リッチー 約束しただろ

translation.en: Your house, my rules.
translation.ja: “お前の家では 俺がルール” 諦めろ

translation.en: Please!
translation.ja: 待ってよ

translation.en: I'd be willing to revisit the bath thing.
translation.ja: お風呂に一緒に入るから

translation.en: Of all the nights to have a stupid family game night,
translation.ja: ゲーム･ナイトの再開日が

translation.en: my dad picks the one night I have concert tickets.
translation.ja: よりによって ライブの日とは

translation.en: Spending quality time with family is important for maintaining meaningful relationships.
translation.ja: 家族と楽しく過ごせば 絆が強くなります

translation.en: You may have a motherboard, but you don't have to act like my mother.
translation.ja: マザーボードが入ってるから 母親役を？

translation.en: Apologies, Master Richie.
translation.ja: 失礼しました

translation.en: Pops be straight trippin', yo.
translation.ja: ポップスなんか イケてないぜ

translation.en: Hey, Richie.
translation.ja: リッチー

translation.en: Guess who just beat Murray in a game of HORSE--
translation.ja: この体で マレーに勝ったわよ

translation.en: the girl who can't use her extremities!
translation.ja: バスケのシュート数でね

translation.en: Well, I have some bad news about Swedish House Sensation.
translation.ja: ライブの件で悪い知らせが

translation.en: Oh, no. Don't tell me he's not going to perform 'Bout Them Meatballs!
translation.ja: 曲目を変更しちゃイヤ “ミートボール”がいい

translation.en: I love that song.
translation.ja: 名曲だね

translation.en: The beat makes me move my feet like a wild man.
translation.ja: 聴くと 足が自然に リズムを刻む

translation.en: The problem is, we can't go to the concert.
translation.ja: ライブに行けなくなった

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: どうして？

translation.en: Why? Do you have plans with some new fancy rich friends?
translation.ja: 新しい裕福な友人と 会うのかな

translation.en: By the way, if they need a money manager,
translation.ja: 僕の名刺を渡してくれ

translation.en: I knew once you became rich you wouldn't want to hang out with us anymore.
translation.ja: 私たちと 一緒にいたくないのね

translation.en: Those gorillas may have broken 84 of my bones,
translation.ja: ゴリラに骨を 折られるよりも―

translation.en: but you broke my heart.
translation.ja: 傷ついたわ

translation.en: You didn't let me finish.
translation.ja: 最後まで聞いて

translation.en: I was saying we can't go to the concert...
translation.ja: 僕は“行けない”と 言っただけだ

translation.en: because it's gonna be here. In my room.
translation.ja: ライブは この部屋でやる

translation.en: It is?
translation.ja: 本当に？

translation.en: That's the plan.
translation.ja: その予定だよ

translation.en: That I just came up with.
translation.ja: 今 思いついた

translation.en: Master Richie, may I have a word?
translation.ja: リッチー様 お話が

translation.en: I do not understand. Are you canceling family game night?
translation.ja: ゲーム･ナイトを 中止するんですか？

translation.en: Nope. I'm going to both.
translation.ja: 両方やるつもりだ

translation.en: I do not think that is a wise--
translation.ja: 私には賢明ではないと…

translation.en: Get yours, son. Word.
translation.ja: やりたきゃやりな　マジで

translation.en: Hello! I am Swedish house sensation
translation.ja: 俺は スウェディッシュ･ ハウス･センセーションだ

translation.en: Swedish House Sensation!
translation.ja: 俺は スウェディッシュ･ ハウス･センセーションだ ようこそ

translation.en: Whoa! Hello, you fine piece of reinforced titanium alloy.
translation.ja: 強化チタン合金製ですわね

translation.en: You are sure easy on the multispectral optical sensors.
translation.ja: マルチスペクトル 光学センサーつき

translation.en: You are bootiful yourself,
translation.ja: 君は なんて美しいんだ

translation.en: but I must say, there is a Mrs. House Sensation.
translation.ja: だが申し訳ない 俺にはワイフがいるんだ

translation.en: So what is having Richie Rich bring me here?
translation.ja: なぜリッチー･リッチは 俺を呼んだ？

translation.en: He was hoping to convince you to move tomorrow's show here.
translation.ja: ここでライブを見たいから

translation.en: Are you suggesting...
translation.ja: つまり君は俺に… 暑いな

translation.en: Oh, it... it's so hot in zis helmet.
translation.ja: つまり君は俺に… 暑いな ヘルメットのせいだ

translation.en: You are human?
translation.ja: 人間だったの？

translation.en: I am sorry, but moving my concert here is not possible.
translation.ja: 悪いが ここで ライブはできない

translation.en: Maybe this will change your mind.
translation.ja: これでもダメ？

translation.en: I will be here at 7:00.
translation.ja: ７時にまた来る

translation.en: But I cannot stay for after- party. If I'm not home in time for family game night,
translation.ja: でもゲーム･ナイトだから ライブ後はすぐ帰るよ

translation.en: my papa will give me a swift kick in ze rumpa!
translation.ja: 遅刻したらパパに蹴られる

translation.en: Murray, where's Darcy? I want to say hi before game night.
translation.ja: ダーシーは？ゲーム･ ナイトの前に会いたい

translation.en: Game night? You mean the concert?
translation.ja: ゲーム･ナイトって？

translation.en: Guys! How do I look?
translation.ja: ねえ このドレスどう？

translation.en: Oh... my... gauze.
translation.ja: こいつは驚いたな

translation.en: I ordered a custom couture body cast so I wouldn't look like an idiot.
translation.ja: ライブに似合うギプスを 特注したの

translation.en: Hope you kept the receipt.
translation.ja: すぐに返品だな

translation.en: Master Richie.
translation.ja: リッチー様

translation.en: 1 minute and 53 seconds until family game night.
translation.ja: １分53秒後に ゲーム･ナイトが

translation.en: And about 5 minutes until I put the moves on that amplifier.
translation.ja: ５分後に私がアンプに 告白します

translation.en: Got to get out here...
translation.ja: 行かなくちゃ

translation.en: You know, Murray. It occurs to me.
translation.ja: マレー 大変だ

translation.en: This concert's gonna add a lot to my electricity bill.
translation.ja: ライブで電気代が 跳ね上がる

translation.en: You're right. How did I miss that?
translation.ja: うっかりしてたよ

translation.en: Permission to dock my pay?
translation.ja: 給料が減っちゃう

translation.en: Don't worry about it.
translation.ja: 心配するな

translation.en: I have an idea to recoup some cash! Souvenir sales!
translation.ja: その埋め合わせに グッズを売る

translation.en: How about you start all the way across the room,
translation.ja: まず部屋の 向こう側から売って

translation.en: then make your way to the other side of the room, avoiding this general vicinity?
translation.ja: 次に反対側だ この辺りは避けて

translation.en: Souvenirs! Get your bobbleheads here!
translation.ja: おバカの皆さん グッズはいかが？

translation.en: -  - Hello, Richie Rich's bedroom!
translation.ja: やあ　リッチー･リッチの ベッドルーム！

translation.en: Thanks again, Richie. Even though I can't see you, because I can't turn my neck.
translation.ja: 首が回らないから あなたの姿は見えないけど

translation.en: It means a lot having you right by my side.
translation.ja: 私の隣にいて くれてるのよね？

translation.en: Yep. Right by your side.
translation.ja: そうだよ 僕は すぐ隣にいる

translation.en: That's where I'll be, all night.
translation.ja: 一晩中 いるからね

translation.en: Richie? Are you still there?
translation.ja: リッチー まだいるの？

translation.en: Of course. I'm right here, Darcy.
translation.ja: もちろんさ 君のそばにいる

translation.en: Do you think that amplifier likes long walks on the beach?
translation.ja: アンプは海辺の散歩が 好きかしら

translation.en: Game night! Time for some family bonding!
translation.ja: ゲーム･ナイトで 家族の絆は復活だ

translation.en: You're lucky I'm in a rush to get this over with. Otherwise I would take the time to strangle you.
translation.ja: 首を絞められたくなければ 早く済ませることね

translation.en: Okay, Harper's in the spirit.
translation.ja: お姉ちゃんは乗り気だね

translation.en: This is all your fault.
translation.ja: 分かってる？

translation.en: I could be out doing something fun with my Friday night,
translation.ja: 金曜の夜は 勉強する予定だったのに

translation.en: like studying, if you hadn't become Mr. Rich and Famous.
translation.ja: 金曜の夜は 勉強する予定だったのに あんたが リッチになったせいよ

translation.en: Okay, for the record, I've been Mr. Rich since I was born.
translation.ja: 僕の名前は 生まれた時から“リッチ”で

translation.en: Until last week, the name was just tragically ironic.
translation.ja: 先週 名実ともにリッチに

translation.en: Okay, time to play Duck, Duck, Hippopotamus!
translation.ja: では“アヒル アヒル カバ”で遊ぼう

translation.en: You mean goose?
translation.ja: ガチョウだろ

translation.en: I mean hippopotamus. I couldn't find a goose costume.
translation.ja: カバだ ガチョウの衣装がなかった

translation.en: -  Costume? - Mm- hmm.
translation.ja: 衣装って？

translation.en: I thought the game would be more fun if we all got into parts.
translation.ja: 役になりきると楽しい

translation.en: Maybe I will take the time to strangle you.
translation.ja: 首を絞めてやる

translation.en: -  - What's that booming noise?
translation.ja: あれは何の音だ

translation.en: Sounds like bass from a concert.
translation.ja: ライブでもやってるのか？

translation.en: Concert? Ha... who has a concert in their house?
translation.ja: 家でそんなこと するわけないよ

translation.en: That's... construction workers I hired to hammer out the spackle.
translation.ja: 工事中の作業員が のりを叩き割ってるんだ

translation.en: Spackle.
translation.ja: のりをね

translation.en: So you guys ready to play?
translation.ja: じゃ 遊ぼう

translation.en: Not really.
translation.ja: まだよ

translation.en: Uh- oh. I'm not feeling too well.
translation.ja: 困ったな お腹が痛くなってきた

translation.en: I need a bathroom.
translation.ja: トイレに行く

translation.en: For everyone's sake, I'm gonna use the one in the south wing.
translation.ja: 南棟のトイレに行くよ

translation.en: Got your text. What's the emergency?
translation.ja: 急用って何？

translation.en: Your friend Darcy's very boring.
translation.ja: ダーシーのお供は退屈です

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だって？

translation.en: You called me up here for that?
translation.ja: それが急用か？

translation.en: Well, that and Swedish House Sensation keeps asking for you.
translation.ja: あのＤＪが あなたを呼べと

translation.en: Is Richie Rich in ze house?
translation.ja: リッチーはどこだ？ ここは彼の自宅なんだろ？

translation.en: I would hope so, since it is his house.
translation.ja: ここは彼の自宅なんだろ？

translation.en: Of course he's here! He's right by my side.
translation.ja: 彼なら 私のすぐ横にいるわ

translation.en: Yep, been here all night.
translation.ja: 一晩中 いるとも

translation.en: Richie! Get up here and shake your rumpa!
translation.ja: リッチー ここへ来て お尻を振れよ

translation.en: This night's been a pain in my rumpa.
translation.ja: 人使いが荒いな

translation.en: Incoming message from your sister:
translation.ja: お姉様から伝言です

translation.en: Richie, get back here!
translation.ja: “リッチー すぐ戻れ”

translation.en: Okay, remember what I said about my dad's voice
translation.ja: パパの声のマネはよせと 言ったよね

translation.en: ruining the magic? It's even more disturbing when you use my sister's.
translation.ja: お姉ちゃんのマネも禁止だ

translation.en: Richie! Richie! Richie!
translation.ja: リッチー！　リッチー！

translation.en: Murray! I need you to dance for me!
translation.ja: 君が代わりに踊れ

translation.en: Put on my jacket and this mask and make me look cool.
translation.ja: 僕のフリして カッコよく頼む

translation.en: I can do two of those things.
translation.ja: フリだけは任せて

translation.en: Richie! Richie!
translation.ja: リッチー！　リッチー！

translation.en: Richie! Richie!
translation.ja: リッチー！　リッチー！

translation.en: I'm back!
translation.ja: 戻ったよ

translation.en: Richie, you're sweating. You must really be sick.
translation.ja: 汗びっしょりだ　病気か？

translation.en: We should cancel family game night until he's all better.
translation.ja: 治るまでゲームは お預けね

translation.en: And here's to hoping he doesn't have one of those chronic gastrointestinal disorders that last a lifetime.
translation.ja: あとは 不治の病じゃない ことを祈るしかない

translation.en: Maybe I should take you to your room and put you to bed.
translation.ja: ベッドまで運んでやる

translation.en: No! I mean...
translation.ja: ダメ パパにはハイテクすぎて 入れないし

translation.en: you wouldn't be able to get in because of that high- tech entry system.
translation.ja: パパにはハイテクすぎて 入れないし

translation.en: And the eye scanner device.
translation.ja: 目をスキャンされる

translation.en: Yeah, those are tricky.
translation.ja: そうだったな よし ゲームをしよう

translation.en: All right, game on!
translation.ja: よし ゲームをしよう

translation.en: -  - Duck... duck...
translation.ja: アヒル…

translation.en: Hello! Richie?
translation.ja: こんばんは リッチーはいる？

translation.en: My sister Gerta has same hippopotamus costume.
translation.ja: 妹のガータと同じ カバの衣装だ

translation.en: - Who is that? - Yeah, who is that?
translation.ja: 誰なの？ 紹介しろ

translation.en: Uh...
translation.ja: 彼は その…

translation.en: Gerta's brother?
translation.ja: ガータの兄さん

translation.en: What are you doing here? You're supposed to be on stage.
translation.ja: 早くライブに戻ってよ

translation.en: I take bathroom break and toilet chase me here.
translation.ja: 小便しに行ったら トイレがついてきた

translation.en: Richie, what's going on here? Who's the Swedish guy?
translation.ja: 説明しろ このスウェーデン人は？

translation.en: Sven.
translation.ja: スヴェンだ

translation.en: Best meatball chef in the biz.
translation.ja: ミートボール作りの 達人だよ

translation.en: He adds a pinch of paprika that really gives a bang to the ball.
translation.ja: パプリカを入れることで パンチの効いた味になる

translation.en: Richie, I'm disappointed in you.
translation.ja: お前には失望した

translation.en: Dad, I can explain--
translation.ja: まず話を

translation.en: No, there's no excuse for this.
translation.ja: 言い訳はよせ

translation.en: Everyone knows the best meatballs are Italian.
translation.ja: ミートボールは イタリア料理だろ

translation.en: You're right!
translation.ja: そうだね

translation.en: Sven, we better get you and your paprika out of here.
translation.ja: スヴェン パプリカと君を 出口へ案内する

translation.en: Richie!
translation.ja: リッチー

translation.en: Who is paprika?
translation.ja: パプリカって誰？

translation.en: What is paprika?
translation.ja: パプリカって何？

translation.en: How's the music playing if you're not even up there?
translation.ja: 音楽が続いてるぞ ＤＪが演奏するわけじゃ ないからな

translation.en: I am deejay. I just hit button and pretend to do stuff.
translation.ja: ＤＪが演奏するわけじゃ ないからな

translation.en: Well, get up there and pretend to do stuff!
translation.ja: 早く戻ってプレイするフリを

translation.en: Murray?
translation.ja: マレー？

translation.en: Irona, where's Richie?
translation.ja: アイロナ リッチーは？

translation.en: Sleep mode.
translation.ja: 睡眠モードです

translation.en: I'm here!
translation.ja: ここだ

translation.en: Why are you dressed like Gerta House Sensation?
translation.ja: ガータと おそろいね

translation.en: Good question. I'll go change.
translation.ja: そうだ 着替えてくる

translation.en: Murray, there's something going on with Richie. We need to find him.
translation.ja: リッチーの様子が変よ 探りを入れる

translation.en: Grab the dolly!
translation.ja: 台車を用意して

translation.en: Are you okay to push me?
translation.ja: あなたに押せる？

translation.en: I- I think so...
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ

translation.en: But I do need to make another appointment with my chiropractor.
translation.ja: その前に カイロ プラクティックの予約を

translation.en: And my attorney.
translation.ja: 弁護士も必要だ

translation.en: No! I can't be on empty!
translation.ja: ガス欠は困るよ

translation.en: Hello, Hallwayside Assistance?
translation.ja: 給油担当をここへ

translation.en: Duck... duck...
translation.ja: アヒル アヒル

translation.en: Duck...
translation.ja: アヒル

translation.en: Hippopotamus!
translation.ja: カバ

translation.en: Why aren't you chasing me?
translation.ja: 追いかけろよ

translation.en: - Self- pride. -
translation.ja: 私にもプライドが

translation.en: What are you two doing here?
translation.ja: 何か用？

translation.en: Looking for Richie.
translation.ja: リッチーはどこ？

translation.en: Hey, so are we!
translation.ja: 俺も知りたい

translation.en: Ooh, hide and seek. I'm gonna go hide in my room for the next ten years.
translation.ja: かくれんぼね 私も10年ほど隠れてくる

translation.en: Hey, I'm back!
translation.ja: 戻ったよ

translation.en: Richie, where have you been?
translation.ja: どこにいた？

translation.en: Yeah, where have you been?
translation.ja: 答えてよ

translation.en: Uh... sleep mode.
translation.ja: えっと… 睡眠モード

translation.en: Dad, Richie was obviously lying and sneaking off to hang with his friends.
translation.ja: 友達と遊びたくて ウソをついてる

translation.en: He needs to punished. And if you need ideas, I have a list.
translation.ja: お仕置きしなきゃ 方法は任せて

translation.en: Richie, why'd you ditch me at the concert?
translation.ja: ライブ会場に戻りましょ

translation.en: Concert? What concert?
translation.ja: ライブって何だ

translation.en: Okay, here's the truth:
translation.ja: 正直に言うよ

translation.en: I promised I would take you guys to Swedish House Sensation,
translation.ja: ２人とライブに行く約束を

translation.en: but then my dad insisted on family game night.
translation.ja: でもパパは ゲーム･ナイトだって

translation.en: I didn't want to let you guys down so I moved the concert here
translation.ja: 約束を守るために― 家でライブをやってもらった

translation.en: and tried to be in two places at once.
translation.ja: 家でライブをやってもらった

translation.en: Richard Rich.
translation.ja: リッチー･リッチ

translation.en: Are you telling me that there are hundreds of strangers
translation.ja: つまり 今― 大勢の人がライブを見に 家に来てるのか？

translation.en: at a concert in this house?
translation.ja: 大勢の人がライブを見に 家に来てるのか？

translation.en: Do you know how much fun Duck, Duck, Hippopotamus would be with that many people?
translation.ja: 全員でパーティーだ 盛り上がるぞ

translation.en: Dad! What about Richie's punishment?
translation.ja: パパ お仕置きは？

translation.en: How 'bout number 37? It's no food or water.
translation.ja: 絶食の刑っていうのは どうかしら

translation.en: I'm sorry I wasn't honest with you guys.
translation.ja: 黙っててごめん

translation.en: I know you were worried that we wouldn't be friends
translation.ja: お金持ちになっても 親友だから…

translation.en: - now that I'm rich and I didn't-- - Yeah, yeah.
translation.ja: お金持ちになっても 親友だから… 話は ライブのあとでいい？

translation.en: Can we talk about this after the concert?
translation.ja: 話は ライブのあとでいい？

translation.en: I really don't want to miss 'Bout Them Meatballs.
translation.ja: “ミートボール”を聴きたい

translation.en: I hate to give you credit, Richie...  But this is awesome!
translation.ja: 悔しいけど ものすごく楽しいわ

translation.en: - Shh! - I'm allowed to talk at a concert!
translation.ja: ライブ会場ならいいでしょ

translation.en: Tchotchkes! Get your tchotchkes here!
translation.ja: グッズは いかがですか

translation.en: Check it! I'm breaking out the robot!
translation.ja: 見て　ロボットダンスだぞ

translation.en: Oh, sure. Because all robots move like that. I am out of here.
translation.ja: ロボットそっくり 私の出番はないわね

translation.en: Duck... duck... duck...
translation.ja: アヒル　アヒル

translation.en: Yeah, this turned out great. Nothing's better than having fun with the people I care about.
translation.ja: 家族や親友と楽しめるなんて 最高だね

translation.en: Wait... where's Darcy?
translation.ja: そういえば ダーシーは？

translation.en: Guys?
translation.ja: みんな どこ？

translation.en: You forgot someone!
translation.ja: 忘れないでよ

translation.en: Can anyone hear me?
translation.ja: 聞こえてる？

translation.en: Richie? Is that you?
translation.ja: リッチー あなたなの？
